question: Which of the following philosophies accepts three of six pramanas (proofs) as the only reliable means of gaining knowledge?
explanation: Samkhya is one of the six astika schools of Hindu philosophy.Being enumerationist philosophy, it accepts three of six pramanas (proofs) as the only reliable means of gaining knowledge. These include pratyak?a (perception), anum??a (inference) and sabda (word).
